UI_visible_response: In 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing, China, experienced multiple serious accidents. On September 27, a fire on a conveyor belt led to lethal levels of carbon monoxide, resulting in the deaths of 16 miners5. This incident was followed by another major accident in December, where gas accumulation at the nearby Diaoshuidong coal mine killed 23 people3. These tragedies highlighted significant safety concerns within the coal mining industry in the region6.
traffic_visible_response: In 2020, the Songzao Coal Mine in Chongqing, China, experienced multiple serious accidents. On September 27, a fire on a conveyor belt led to lethal levels of carbon monoxide, resulting in the deaths of 16 miners [[5]]. This incident was followed by another major accident in December, where gas accumulation at the nearby Diaoshuidong coal mine killed 23 people [[3]]. These tragedies highlighted significant safety concerns within the coal mining industry in the region [[6]].
